display_notes: We use the IMF’s fossil fuel subsidies database (2021) to calculate the avoided air pollution costs of industrial fuel consumption. This database provides costs specific to industry’s use of coal and natural gas. We use coal costs for coke, and use costs shown in transport for diesel and gasoline. We use an average cost across all fuels for biomass.
